<0> <4> A graphic shows the title of the segment, "17th place: Super simple summer [?] restaurant!".

<12> <16> A close-up shot shows cold noodles being lifted from a bowl.
<16> <18> Three different bowls of Korean cold noodles (naengmyeon) are displayed on a table.
